name: Food Fighters: The Final Course
description:
Hi! Welcome to the itch.io page for our school project.

We (Jurre, Thimo, Tristan, Shun Yao and Dreymiun) are developing Food Fighters: The Last Course, a chaotic party fighting game for the whole family in which you play as different kinds of food trying not end up in the soup. Using an arsenal of whacky items you will try to knock your friends of the map. Will you be the last food standing?

The game is currently in early acces and we plan to add many more items and fun maps to play on in the future.
